page.title: 04My Day K.Walters.Ashford C.
page.content: I woke up and made my bed and dressed myself.I pulled the curtain and brushed my hair and put my nightie away.Then went down to lay the breakfast table,then I did some singing and we had breakfast.I had Harvest Crunch for my breakfast.I practised my piano and did the wiping upThen Gina came and we went up to Emma's bedroom.Then Gina,Emma and I went for a bike ride.When we came back I went up stairs to play with Emma and Gina.Then I went outside.Later I I helped lay the dinner table. I sat in the sun lounge with Mum and then we had lunch.After,I did the washing up and wiping up and then Emma and I and Gina dressed up and we scared Vicki Then we played 'Sardines'. After that I had tea and then I had a lolly from the icecream van.Then I sat on Dad's knee and after that I washed and dried
